page.title: 02LITTLE MILL VILLAGE HALL
page.content: The hall was built 50 years ago,all by voluntary labour.November 2nd 1985 was a celebration evening in the hall attended by many of the men who had built it.It was a great success with many of the men reunited for the first time in 30 years. Many activities are held at the hall such as:keep fit classes,craft class, bingo,whist,modern and sequence dance club and of course W.I. Tuesdays and Saturdays are available for outside bookings which are often discos and wedding receptions. A very colourful carnival is held annually in August opened by a well known personality.
